name: Falling Leaves (SilviShinyStar)
description:
🍂🍂🍂

As Fall starts, leaves start raining everywhere and you get to play around with the leaves in different ways. As a kid, you can run and jump around in the piles of leaves; as a leaf blower, you are in charge of blowing the leaves away and into the compost bin; as a cloud, you can rain to wash away the leaves; and as a woodpecker you can peck the trees to make more leaves fall.

🍂🍂🍂

Controls

  • Kid
    • Arrow keys ---- Move
    • Spacebar ------- Jump
  • Leaf blower
    • Arrow keys ------------------- Move
    • Spacebar (press or hold) --- Blow
  • Cloud
    • Spacebar (hold) ----- Rain
  • Woodpecker
    • X -------------- Peck
    • Spacebar ---- Change tree
  • All
    • T ----- Trade places

------

A little toy I made for the Cozy Fall Jam 2022! I had a busy weekend so I couldn't add everything I wanted, but I'm happy with the result, it is cute and fun. :3
